thread.section_title: BikeTiresDirect.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BikeTiresDirect.com | biketiresdirect.com | 2 of 30
thread.title: Kurt Jambretz

author: Kurt Jambretz
title: Kurt Jambretz
text: I used their "price match" tool to show them a lower price from a competitor's web site thinking that they would dispute it, or that it would add some processing time to my order. Nope! I was wrong, they honored the price without issue, shipped the product the next day and I had it two days later. I am not a big mail order shopper as I support my local shop, but when he doesn't have something and I need it, I always go to BikeTiresDirect.com!! Great service Every time!
